posts.post_content:
Approximately 8 1/4" x 11 1/4", original Old Judge ad poster. It is on thicker cardboard and is trimmed at least on the right side. I am not sure how much but I don't think too much.  At the very bottom the last "Y" in New York is cut off. Absolutely great lithography. Will come with a very old but not great looking frame. Added to my website with a larger scan, under misc. items, along with a few other things in other places...more added soon..$495 OBO Delivered for this poster. Item has an 1885 Copyright date on it but I have been told that might not be their date of issue...

[url]www.luckeycards.com[/url]
Leon....if still available I'm take the Kittery cabinet. John

[quote name="buchner" post=1277203]Leon....if still available I'm take the Kittery cabinet. John[/QUOTE]

It is beautiful and available...we can take it to PM's if interested.....thanks...

[IMG]http://luckeycards.com/sphoto1890skitteryteam4.jpg[/IMG]
Sounds good Leon, please PM me as I'm not sure how to do it (not to smart), Thanks, John
